nodes.text: Snugli Explevey was a male Human Meatlump criminal who lived on the planet Corellia during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin, he operated out of the Meatlump Hideout in Coronet City. Around 1 ABY, Snugli Explevey, a technology-hating Meatlump, grew distraught over the large number of harvesting machines sprouting throughout the galaxy. To combat what he perceived to be a threat to society, he gave a spacer a film camera to take pictures of harvesters on a number of worlds, namely: Corellia, Dantooine, Dathomir, Endor, Lok, Naboo, Rori, Talus, Tatooine, Yavin 4. Using the information taken from the pictures, the Meatlumps would be able to locate future targets.

Snugli Explevey was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Snugli Explevey was added to the game as part of the "Meatlumps Theme Park", introduced with "Chapter 10: The Search for the Meatlump King", released on June 19, 2008.
During each server reset, Explevey's appearance was randomized, but he consistently appeared as a Human male.
